Text: Mathematics in India...how to count the poor, how to count the starving, how to count the abused, how to count the illiterate...

While it is true that in light of the appalling circumstances that most people in India have to live in the triumphalism currently coming from India is both ridiculous and pathetic (especially when it comes to spending untold amounts on pissing contests like nuclear weapons and space stuff, while the Indian masses still starve and remain mired in ignorance and illiteracy) its historical influence on mathematics is anything but.
guys can we just talk about mathematics. we can pick even useful bits from filthy places.. just like lotus from mud. come on .. RISE!!!!!!
I would just like to thanks malestrom_HH for the  hard work of delivering the goodies time and time again :-)

Yes people are starving in India. 
But people are also starving in USA.
